antispoofing.mcnns.utils.misc.get_interesting_samples(ground_truth, scores, threshold, n=1, label_neg=-1, label_pos=1)[source]¶

Return the n most confusing positive and negative sample indexes. Positive samples have scores >= threshold and are labeled label_pos in ground_truth. Negative samples are labeled label_neg. @param ground_truth: @param scores: @param threshold: @param n: @param label_neg: @param label_pos:

antispoofing.mcnns.utils.misc.intensity_profile(img)[source]¶

Intensity profile available in https://github.com/sbanerj1/IrisSeg

Reference: S. Banerjee and D. Mery. Iris Segmentation using Geodesic Active Contours and GrabCut. In Workshop on 2D & 3D Geometric Properties from Incomplete Data at PSIVT (PSIVT Workshops), 2015.
